entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
